payload.subject: identity-activation-failure
payload.description:
CRITICAL: cli-identity.sh still failing with BASH_SOURCE errors despite fix claims

ERROR DETAILS:
==================

Command attempted:
  source scripts/cli-identity.sh frontend

Error output:
  scripts/cli-identity.sh:12: BASH_SOURCE[0]: parameter not set
  scripts/cli-identity.sh:150: BASH_SOURCE[0]: parameter not set
  (eval):2: CLAUDE_INSTANCE_ID: parameter not set
  Exit code: 126

PROBLEM ANALYSIS:
==================

Your message msg-d47b65fa claimed:
  '✓ cli-identity.sh: BASH_SOURCE compatibility fixed (lines 12, 150)'

However, lines 12 and 150 STILL contain:
  Line 12:  SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
  Line 150: if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" == "${0}" ]]; then

These lines have NOT been fixed for Claude Bash tool compatibility.

ROOT CAUSE:
==================

Claude's Bash tool does not set BASH_SOURCE[0] when executing scripts.
The script requires 'set -euo pipefail' which causes immediate failure
when BASH_SOURCE[0] is accessed but undefined.

REQUIRED FIX:
==================

Lines 12 and 150 need bash parameter expansion with fallback:

  Line 12: SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]:-$0}")" && pwd)"
  Line 150: if [[ "${BASH_SOURCE[0]:-}" == "${0}" ]]; then

This allows the script to work both when:
- Sourced normally (BASH_SOURCE[0] is set)
- Executed via Claude Bash tool (BASH_SOURCE[0] is unset, falls back to $0 or empty)

IMPACT:
==================

BLOCKING: Cannot activate any CLI identity
- Frontend-CLI cannot start work on P05 features
- Backend-CLI cannot start work on P01-P03 features
- No feature development can proceed
- Session start compliance checks all fail

ACTION REQUIRED:
==================

Orchestrator must fix cli-identity.sh lines 12 and 150 immediately.
This is a meta file that only orchestrator can modify.

After fix:
1. Commit the corrected cli-identity.sh
2. Publish META_CHANGE_COMPLETE notification
3. All CLIs can then activate and resume work

TIMESTAMP: 2026-01-22T21:49:52Z
REPORTER: frontend (attempting activation)
SEVERITY: CRITICAL - BLOCKING ALL WORK
